lexUnit.name: fasten.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: fix or hold in place

sentence.text: Six of the engineers had swum to the northern bank where they were fastening a rope to a great elm tree .
People were fastening a rope to the ring .
At the Grand , David Swan fastened his amended photopass to his jacket and set off briskly towards the conference centre some two hundred yards away .
Now we fasten pinecones to the dahlia sticks and shake them out every few days .
A dozen suited men were fastening the edges of the insulator to the brace of the frame .
Then , very slowly , Mr Evans fastened his belt round his trousers …
He fastened his cloak round his shoulders .
The huge black doors of the boat-house had been fastened back to allow free access .
The wire is generally fastened to the bracelet with a popper so even if she forgets about it and walks away from her machine with it still attached , it will just pop apart .
The edges of adjacent planks were not fastened together mechanically but stood open so as to form a V-shaped groove .
The Privy Seal is a seal fastened on royal documents .
He can work comfortably and easily despite the weight and restriction of the line fastened to his collar .
A pair of hauling ropes is also fastened to the leading edge of each tank , one rope towards each end of the tank .
Some of the money was in a bag fastened to her walking frame .
They fastened the pieces to the telescope with wire .
Officials and residents in Ito have been preparing for the worst , taping window glass to prevent shattering , and fastening bookshelves and cabinets to walls to prevent them from toppling .
Smith said the 50-pound bust was fastened by a large bolt to a pedestal .

Even a satellite telephone was left behind , fastened to the outside of the building of weathered wooden planks where Marcos once wrote his communiques to the news media and planned his military strategy .
A German-engineered computer chip fastened to each entrant 's shoelaces will be keeping time .
Police in anti-explosive gear were removing three other similar black can-like objects fastened to the pylon by vinyl tape about 3 meters ( 10 feet ) above the ground , the spokesman said .
